Class Summary
Application Ibis-based Java Application Description.

Experiment An experiment.
IntentSoftwareDescription  
Job Running job of an experiment
JobDescription Single job in an experiment.
Jungle Jungle containing resources.
JythonSoftwareDescription  
LocalServer Server or Hub running on the local machine (inside the deploy jvm).
RemoteServer Server or Hub running on a remote resource (cluster, stand-alone machine, etc)
Resource Resource, accessible using some sort of middleware.
Workspace Container object for a set of resources(jungle), applications, and experiment.

Exception Summary
AlreadyExistsException Thrown if a job/resource/application of the given name already exists in the experiment/jungle/applicationSet.
